subproject.description: the project objective is to systematically remove or substantially mitigate threats facing globally significant biodiversity and sustinability at two demonstration sites, while ensuring that the lessons learned through these demonstrations are asorbed within wetland protected area  (WPA) management systems throughout Iran and most particularly at a set of target replicaton sites.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Conservation of Wetlands

subproject.description: Lake Uromiyeh Drought Risk Management Project for sustainable livelihoods, biodiversity and micro-climate management (supplementary project to the ongoing UNDP/GEF Conservation of Iranian Wetlands Project). the project is multidimensional and brings together assistance in various areas to complement and support the ongoing project for wetlands conservation. the proejct is built around addressing the issue of persistent drought in the GEF project area and offers support in drought risk analysis and management.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Drought Risk Management
